## Lab 9: Factor Analysis and SEM

In this lab, you will evaluate a survey that measures anxiety towards statistics, which was created by Andy Field. The objective of this lab is to:

-   Assess the suitability of factor analysis for the survey

-   Decide on the number of factors to extract

-   Choose an extraction and rotation method

-   Interpret and name the factors

-   Validate the model using CFA

Through this lab, you will gain experience in performing EFA and SEM/CFA using R, as well as visualizing and writing up the results.

To access Lab 9, please [click here](https://classroom.github.com/a/7Hpwn0sM).
